name: clomp
description: A class name composer that helps you style your components with utility styles. It's like styled-components for CSS utility frameworks.

scripts.build: yarn workspace @clomp/core build; yarn workspace @clomp/react build
scripts.test: yarn workspace @clomp/core test; yarn workspace @clomp/react test
scripts.lint: yarn workspace @clomp/core lint; yarn workspace @clomp/react lint
scripts.lint:fix: yarn workspace @clomp/core lint:fix; yarn workspace @clomp/react lint:fix
scripts.prettier: yarn workspace @clomp/core prettier; yarn workspace @clomp/react prettier
scripts.prettier:check: yarn workspace @clomp/core prettier:check; yarn workspace @clomp/react prettier:check
